job.title: Remote .Net Software Engineer - Remote - .NET, JSON, Rest
job.description: We have been in business for 45 yrs Our portfolio consists of 12000 global brands amp 1750 global retailers amp distributors We are widely profitable and make 34 acquisitions a year We have 30 year over year growthbrbrDespite our rapid growth we have kept a people first amp employee first culture In fact our Engineering organization is led by an industry leader who has had ZERO attrition We did not lay off ONE PERSON in 2020 or 2021 and we paid bonuses to our staff before our executives got any We are a fast paced environment and looking for people who want to scale build long term careers and RETIRE with usbrbrWhat You Will Be Doingbrbr35 years professional experience developing software using relevant technologies CNET core JSON XMLbr Professional experience with REST API developmentintegrationmaintenance through C and NET corebr Ability to develop and maintain ImportExport feeds through CNET corebr Experience developing MicroservicesWeb servicesbr Experience in data transmission through messages FTP file transferbr Experience with development in cloud environment Azurebr Experience with Azure durable messaging App Insights service busbr Experience with GitGitlabbrbrWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli NETlili JSONlili Restlili Clili XMLbrliulWhats In It for Youbrulli16 Days PTO  3 Floating Days  7 other holidays Your PTO rolls into the next calendar year too We also have 2 volunteer days per yearlili Full Benefits cost varies based on planlili Employee Assistance Programlili Paid Leave for Qualifying Events Maternity Leave 6 weeks Paternity Leave 1 week Adoption Leave 4 weeks for primary caregiverlili Tuition reimbursement 3000 per year max 5000 lifetime max eligibility requirements include 1 year of employment with us before enrollmentlili Financial Wellness programs fully funded by us through SmartDollarlili Voluntary Supplemental Insurance availablelili Employee referral bonuseslili Identity Theft Protection premium dependent on options selectedbrliulSo if you are a strong Net Software Engineer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrDylanRogelstadCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  DR51624988  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulDylan Rogelstad  Lead Recruiter  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired
